sentences.english: A savage howl, like an ominous setting sun, punctured immortality so slimy and solemn.
sentences.chinese: 有狂野的嗥叫像不祥的殘陽擊穿粘稠肅穆的永恆。

sentences.english: Or just lots of other wild singles.
sentences.chinese: 或者只是更多其他狂野的單身貴族？

sentences.english: I cast my self into the wild hunt.
sentences.chinese: 我將自己拋入這狂野的追獵。

sentences.english: Assuming this no-holds-barred approach will add to the spontaneity factor of having sex outside the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 它讓臥室之外的性愛倍增狂野激情。

sentences.english: And the bugle wild and shrill.
sentences.chinese: 還有狂野而尖利的號角。

sentences.english: Dany gave her wild children one last lingering look.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮給了她狂野的孩子們最後一瞥。

sentences.english: After every wild, stimulating short-term pleasure of life is going to paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 每次狂野過後，刺激快感短暫的麻痹了對生活的憧憬。

sentences.english: Rude and blustering the winds of March often are.
sentences.chinese: 三月的風經常是粗魯和狂野的。

sentences.english: Even then, I was disturbed by the wildest dreams.
sentences.chinese: 就在那時我還被那些狂野的夢所困擾。

sentences.english: And Grint recently starred in the farce comedy "Wild Target".
sentences.chinese: 而Grint則在喜劇片“狂野目標”中擔任主演。

sentences.english: This formidable battle, will threes wild heart clingy one place.
sentences.chinese: 這次赴湯蹈火之戰，將三顆狂野的心緊貼一處。

sentences.english: Judgement. Judgement is the counter-balance to wild enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 判斷力和狂野的熱情是相互平衡的。

sentences.english: Dirty girl, gettin' down, dance with guys from outta town.
sentences.chinese: 狂野的女孩，從臺下走下來，和一羣鄉巴佬一同跳舞。

sentences.english: Shouldn't mistreat me, baby, because I'm young and wild.
sentences.chinese: 不該虐待我，寶貝，因爲我年輕狂野。

sentences.english: What is raped young wild, foam to a pure smiling face?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼掠奪了年少時的狂野，沫去了那張純真的笑臉？

sentences.english: In many ways, venture capital in China is like the wild west.
sentences.chinese: 在許多方面，中國的風險投資就好比是狂野的西部。

definition: the Way of the Hegemon/abbr. for 霸王之道/despotic rule/rule by might/evil as opposed to the Way of the King 王道/overbearing/tyranny/(of liquor, medicine etc) strong/potent
